description: Sweet tea is a Southern staple, and&nbsp;sangria is a classic summertime drink. So what could be better than combining the two? Sweet Tea Sangria is the perfect drink for lazy days on the porch.The sweet tea provides an energizing base, while the fruit and wine add a touch of sweetness. The best part about Sweet Tea Sangria is that you can customize it.
name: Sweet Tea Sangria
recipeIngredient: 1 bottle of White wine, such as Sauvignon Blanc

recipeInstructions.name: Combine wine, sweet tea, triple sec, frozen peaches, and raspberries in a pitcher.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine wine, sweet tea, triple sec, frozen peaches, and raspberries in a pitcher.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir until combined and refrigerate until chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Stir until combined and refrigerate until chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with fresh mint leaves and serve.
